data.description:
A dystopian future. An authoritarian regime. A tale of violence, intrigue, and hope. Swing from towering skyscrapers and battle deadly enemies as you fight to free your city from the evil that consumes it. Will you bow to the forces of oppression? Or will you have the strength to Resist?

Resist is a single-player action RPG designed for Meta Quest. With a kinetic swinging system, intense combat, and a fully immersive story, Resist is the VR experience you’ve been waiting for.

Features
● Open world: explore the city of Concord and uncover its secrets
● Rich story campaign: follow Sam Finch as she fights to free herself and her city
● Dozens of side quests: Pillage data facilities, fight enemy hordes, and learn more about the colorful characters of the Resistance
● Tactile puzzles: hack billboards and win the public to your side
● Deep skill tree: level up and enhance your core abilities
● Online leaderboards: compete in skill challenges and prove your swing prowess to the world

While Resist can be enjoyed on all Meta Quest hardware, significant enhancements have been made to leverage the power of the META QUEST 3.

Patch v1.0.197

* Added ProTube VR support.
* Improved the auto-recentering while in flight option and moved it to Locomotion > Recenter On Flight (Anti Spin).
* Fixed an issue that could sometimes cause players to fall through the world.
* Clearing a five star threat level, and then re-engaging Astra forces should now correctly ramp back up to 5 stars again.

Patch v1.0.185

New language support has been added, including:
      -  Chinese (simplified and traditional)
      -  French
      -  Italian
      -  Spanish
      -  German
      -  Thai
      -  Brazilian Portuguese
      -  Korean

As well as:
* All new game keyart
* New player onboarding improvements
* Improvements to Arcade swing mode
* Various QOL additions

Patch v1.0.178

* New Experimental option (Experimental>Recenter On Flight) to prevent grapple spinning from an offset roomscale orientation
* Added support for the new Oculus Cloud Backup system
* Added in-game patch notes display

* Added support for the new Oculus Cloud Backup system
* Added in-game patch notes display

Patch v1.0.173

New Additions:
* Added four new difficulty levels, ranging from Story to Extreme (They have no effect on leaderboard events)
* Added New Game Plus mode allowing players that have completed the game to start a new game retaining all upgrades against more difficult enemies
* 31 Achievements have been added
* A new bomber drone variant has made an appearance on the streets of Concord
* The x-ray pulse upgrade will now also help locate the codex collectables, listen out for a directional chime

Visual Updates:
* The citizens of Concord have received a makeover just in time for the holidays
* Speaking of the holidays, it's Christmas in Concord! The resistance is feeling the Christmas cheer with Ezra's safehouse being re-decorated for the holiday season

Fixes: 
* Fixed an issue that could cause flickering throughout the city
* Fixed an issue that could cause enemies to despawn prematurely
* Fixed cameras sometimes not being active between missions
* Several other minor fixes and improvements

Hotfix v1.0.162
* Increased the frequency in which player data is saved to disk, to prevent rare cases in which earned XP could be lost.

Patch v1.0.160

Experimental Options:
* New tab added to the options menu titled 'Experimental'
* This menu will be used for new settings that are early access, which explore comfort & experience improvements and requests
* The first addition to this menu is the early preview of the new 'Detached' camera mode that stops the player camera getting rotated with swing movement to prevent associated discomfort

Locomotion Updates:
* Added an option for head based forward direction when using the jetpack
* Added an option to switch controller hands
* New slider for camera turn speed on the 'Fixed Speed' & 'Smooth' settings
* Added an option to toggle the jump circle UI
* Added an option to disable thumbstick steering while in the air

Balance Adjustments:
* A new billboard hack layout has been added
* Crypto has tuned the Platinum score requirements on Sky Hopper #4 & #7

Fixes:
* Fixed an issue where the shotgun acquisition could be skipped
* Fixed an issue that caused the jetpack to be unobtainable in Mission 5
* Fixed a typo in the loading screen tips
* Fixed head direction not working with 'Smooth' walking
* Several minor bug fixes and improvements
